section.title: &Yap; enhancements
section.para: &Yap; will be stabilized and developed further. For example, &PostScript; specials will be fully supported.

section.title: New update wizard UI
section.para: The user interface will be improved to allow a faster (less mouse-clicks) run.

section.title: &MiKTeX; for 64-bit &Windows; operating systems
section.para: &MiKTeX; binaries for 64-bit &Windows; operating systems will be made available.

section.title: &Yap;
section.para: &Yap; will be a viewer for &PostScript;/&PDF; documents.

section.title: &MiKTeX; for &Unixlike; operating systems, Phase 2
section.para: Most &MiKTeX; utilities will run on &Unixlike; operating systems. The &GUI; applications (&Yap;, update wizard, and so on) will be reimplemented to use the Qt toolkit.
